parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: It is an Alibaba Cloud asset management and configuration tool, with which you can manage multiple Alibaba Cloud products and services by using commands. It is easy to use and a good helper in migration to cloud.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The return result of the request.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Alibaba Cloud provides SDKs in different languages to help you quickly integrate Alibaba Cloud products and services by using APIs. We recommend that you use an SDK to call APIs. In this way, you do not need to sign for verification.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The information about the database tables.

parameters.name: WithTables
parameters.description:
The role of the account.    
In MySQL mode, a role is a database-level role. Valid values:  
- ReadWrite: a role that has the read and write privileges, namely ALL PRIVILEGES.  
- ReadOnly: a role that has only the read-only privilege SELECT.   
- DDL: a role that has the DDL privileges such as CREATE, DROP, ALTER, SHOW VIEW, and CREATE VIEW.   
- DML: a role that has the DML privileges such as SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and SHOW VIEW.
